content-body.text:
Your credit card will be charged by Hedgestone Group.
Should you require our assistance or support, please, do not hesitate to contact us by phone (UK) +44 203 318 5207.
We are here to help you.

Iconic PS Ltd, a company which processes card transactions for Icon Markets Limited, takes liability for any complaints originating from users who deposit money through Iconic PS Ltd. content-body.text:
Should you require our assistance or support, please, do not hesitate to contact us by phone (UK) +44 203 318 5207.
We are here to help you.
You can add funds to your account by wire transfer. Kindly note that the minimum amount for wire transfers is 1,500 units (in any of the below-listed currencies). There is no maximum amount.

When you submit a deposit via wire, you will not be able to trade with the deposited funds until they have been verified as received by our finance team and added to your account. To speed up the process, please be sure to notify a member of the Hedgestone team about your wire and include your name in the Payment Reference field. You can contact Customer Support at any time by sending an email to support@hedgestonegroup.com or by calling +44 203 318 5207.
